entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is shouting at Mundungus and trying to get him back.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: A thief who has been caught by Harry. He turns blue, loses his hands, and then Disapparates.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who tries to stop him from getting into trouble with Mundungus.

relationships.description: Harry is shouting at Mundungus to come back. This is evident from the dialogue 'COME BACK, YOU THIEVING –!'

Harry is trying to get Mundungus back after he Disapparated. This is evident from the dialogue 'COME BACK, YOU THIEVING –!' and Harry's actions of spinning on the spot to see where Mundungus had gone.
Hermione is trying to stop Harry from getting into trouble with Mundungus. This is evident from the dialogue 'Harry , you mustn’t!'
